TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
I think I know the final foe I would like to face.
I think I know the final foe I would like to face.
I think I know the final foe I would like to face.
I think I know the final foe I would like to face.
What?
What?
What?
What?
The Frost Dragon you fought was impressive, but I wish to face Ragnar, their father. He is an Ancient Frost Dragon - the second oldest Dragon in Etheria.
The Frost Dragon you fought was impressive, but I wish to face Ragnar, their father. He is an Ancient Frost Dragon - the second oldest Dragon in Etheria.
The Frost Dragon you fought was impressive, but I wish to face Ragnar, their father. He is an Ancient Frost Dragon - the second oldest Dragon in Etheria.
The Frost Dragon you fought was impressive, but I wish to face Ragnar, their father. He is an Ancient Frost Dragon - the second oldest Dragon in Etheria.
But how will we find Ragnar? He lives up in the mountains.
But how will we find Ragnar? He lives up in the mountains.
But how will we find Ragnar? He lives up in the mountains.
But how will we find Ragnar? He lives up in the mountains.
Let us go and battle his children once more. When we have his attention, I will face him in battle.
Let us go and battle his children once more. When we have his attention, I will face him in battle.
Let us go and battle his children once more. When we have his attention, I will face him in battle.
Let us go and battle his children once more. When we have his attention, I will face him in battle.
Are you sure this is what you want?
Are you sure this is what you want?
Are you sure this is what you want?
Are you sure this is what you want?
To fall in battle against one of the greatest Dragons the world has ever known? I am certain.
To fall in battle against one of the greatest Dragons the world has ever known? I am certain.
To fall in battle against one of the greatest Dragons the world has ever known? I am certain.
To fall in battle against one of the greatest Dragons the world has ever known? I am certain.
Then let's go to Ragnar's Coast.
Then let's go to Ragnar's Coast.
Then let's go to Ragnar's Coast.
Then let's go to Ragnar's Coast.
